<js>
function login(){
	email = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("é‚®ç®±");
	pwd = source.getLoginInfoMap().get("å¯†ç ");
	url = "https://api.unifans.io/account/login";
	body = {
          "boundMailbox": String(email),
          "password": String(pwd)
         }
	post = {
		"method":"POST",
		"body":JSON.stringify(body)
		   }
	url = url+","+JSON.stringify(post);
	token = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).data.token;
	authorization = "hgq "+token;
 authorization = {
 	"authorization":String(authorization)
 	}	; 
 	source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(authorization));
	}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterUrl: if(/getCollections/.test(baseUrl)){ result = "https://api.unifans.io/creator/getCollectionDetail?collectionId={{$._id}}&_t={{Date.now()}}"; }else if(/getPostsByCollection/.test(baseUrl)){ text = String(java.getString("$.text")).replace(/<\/*span.*?>| style=".*?"/g,''); img =''; html = text+"\n"+img; result = `data:postId;base64,${java.base64Encode("{{$.postId}}")},{"type":""}`; //cache.put(result,text+"\n"+img); result }
